title: Exploring threats and vulnerabilities in hacker web: Forums, IRC and carding shops

excerpt: Abstract—Cybersecurity is a problem of growing relevance that impacts all facets of society. As a result, many researchers have become interested in studying cybercriminals and online hacker communities in order to develop more effective cyber defenses. In particular,  ...
